name: RuinsCity_VR
summary:
RuinsCityVR 
 
Game is one and a half of sand box of VRgame, a city by virus attacks, many people unfortunately infected by the virus to the original consciousness become a walking dead, they are only for the sake of food!!!!! But you are the only one to survive in this city. Are you going to look for survivors and together they walked out of the city, of course the monsters in the city to find a way to attack your they evolved to take a gun to shoot you, you have to be careful!! It is important, you'll think of some way to live!!!!!!
